WorkItem.Description:
Upon clicking the DOWNLOAD, button to download the framework file(s), it keeps on attempting to download several times, without actually downloading any file(s).  Have attempted unsuccessfully to download the file(s) from both IE and Chrome.  
   Any guidance in resolving the issue with downloading the framework file(s), would be highly appreciated.

Thanks
WorkItem.Summary: Unable to download the framework file(s)

Comments.Message: See Description for the issue details.
It must be a problem on your side (or it could have been a transient problem with the codeplex service).
